header.line: CVE-2015-XXXX [Kernel: Unprivileged user can freeze journald]
header.name: TEMP-0000000-F7A20F

annotations.line: NOTE: Issue in Linux related to unprivileged CLONE_NEWUSER affecting systemd, but we disable unprivileged use by default
